description:
If you have the 'Soonacity Pioneer Citizenship' badge, then claim this award and you will be awarded with additional 54 XP!

This will allow you to gain an unlimited 6% discount on our public mint of the limited OG Soonacity collection on Sunday 10th April @ 17 UTC

Please be aware that we can only guarantee the on time approval till sunday 10th April at 16 UTC. 
After the inital start of the mint, approvals will be irregular! 

So claim your discount NOW ;-)
name: Soonacity Pioneer Discount
